segments.text: Looking in, I spot the woman facing away from me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing a plate, towel bunched up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's full, water cascading over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's hitting the floor hard, puddle expanding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress hem's getting wet; she must feel it soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes piled on the counter to her side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Left side shows the open cabinet with cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on the two-step stool, stretched tall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool's wobbling; he's in real danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's nearby, hand raised for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This secret snack time could turn disastrous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's view of the garden is so refreshing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's all hazards and hidden naughtiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor things, if only they knew.
segments.speaker: PAR
